EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Send a Email when New Case For BSP Within EDD
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW New Case Notification For BSP Within EDD
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thanks, we’ve received your enquiry
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for your enquiry about parcel {!IF(ISNULL(Case.ReferenceID__c)), '',Case.ReferenceID__c} '.' Your reference number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
This parcel is expected on {!IF(ISNULL(Case.EstimatedDelivery__c)), '',Case.EstimatedDelivery__c}.
What happens next
We’ll monitor this parcel until {!IF(ISNULL(Case.HeldToOpenOn__c)), '',Case.HeldToOpenOn__c}.
If it hasn’t been delivered by then, we’ll begin investigating. No need to submit another enquiry.
We’ll keep you updated
You’ll hear back from us after we review your enquiry on {!IF(ISNULL(Case.HeldToOpenOn__c)), '',Case.HeldToOpenOn__c - usually within 2 business days - or if this parcel is delivered.
If you no longer need us to manage your enquiry, you can cancel it easily by closing your case.
CLOSE MY CASE
Kind regards, Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
